title: Stowaway. Part 3. Food storage
brief_description: Covers the inspection of food by the U.S. Army Veterinary Corps, the Bureau of Animal Industry and the Port Food Service Inspector prior to procurement for use aboard troop transports. Shows in detail the principles and proper facilities for food storage and preservation.
